ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the Centre for Research, Agricultural Advancement, Teaching Excellence and Sustainability in Food and Nutrition Security (CREATES-FNS) at the Nelson Mandela African Institution of Science and Technology (NM-AIST) for the financial support. We thank Rufford Small Grants Foundation (Grant/Award Number 24376-1) and British Ecological Society (BES) for the research financial support. The authors would like to thank the laboratory staff of the Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture, Kenya, for their assistance in baobab seed oil analyses. Finally, Upendo Msalilwa is thankful to her employer, Tanzania Forestry Research Institute (TAFORI), for granting her a study leave for PhD studies.
